resources.string: Thalia enters with an air of authority, her windswept hair and the faint breeze that follows her hinting at her command over the skies, her eyes assessing the tavern with a keen gaze. A sparkling ale, if you please. Something that dances on the palate like a gentle breeze over the clouds. The skies were restless today; a drink to calm the winds sounds perfect.

string-array.name: player_thalia
string-array.item: After a day of restlessness in the skies, may your drink bring a serene calmness to match your airy presence.
Be careful, the drink might try to take flight before you get to savor it, just like your untamed skies today.
Your air of authority matches the winds you command. Maybe I could be the grounding force you seek?
